Set-up and load packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
filter <- c("help")
```


Step 1: Create 10 separate documents containing the tokens used by each 2020 DEMOCRATIC candidate in each vice/virtue foundation 
```{r}
#BIDEN
  #fairness
biden_fairness.vice <- tokens_select(toks_biden, pattern = extracted_dict$fairness.vice_ex, valuetype = "glob")
biden_fairness.vice <- as.character(biden_fairness.vice)
biden_fairness.vice <- paste0(biden_fairness.vice, collapse = " ")
biden_fairness.vice_dfm <- dfm(biden_fairness.vice, tolower = TRUE)
```
